page.title: 18VILLAGE EVENTS
page.content: {VILLAGE EVENTS The main event each year in Alne is { {Alne Show}there are many stalls and ring events such as dancing, bands, sheepdog displays, hovercrafts and model helicopters and planes. A grand raffle draw is held with very good prizes. There are old vintage cars and traction engines on show and an old barrel organ as well. There is a craft tent displaying old crafts such as lacemaking. There are on display results of childrens competitions such as modelling and writing. There are stalls outside with other different crafts on such as woodcavings. There are rides and games for children and a few stalls that sold things such as jewellery, jokes and sweets.There is also a gymkhana, which is mainly showjumping competitions. The money raised is to provide a playing field.
